markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Patron's Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=1870) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=44)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1867)

</column>

---

You can cast more spells each day. Increase the spell slots you gain from witch archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest witch spell slots.
name: Patron's Breadth
